mapper.select: SELECT indtl.sls_in_dtl_date, stock.fin_prd_cd_code, prdcd.fin_prd_cd_name, stock.fns_prd_stk_vol, stock.fns_prd_stk_lot_no, indtl.sls_in_dtl_remk FROM BF_SALES_FINISH_PRODUCT_STOK stock JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE prdcd ON stock.fin_prd_cd_code = prdcd.fin_prd_cd_code JOIN BF_SALES_IN_DTL indtl ON stock.sls_in_dtl_no = indtl.sls_in_dtl_no WHERE stock.fns_prd_stk_vol > 0
